alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms and outflow winds will impact portions of south central Box Elder and central Tooele Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms and outflow winds along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Utah Test and Training Range South to 14 miles southeast of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Skull Valley and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 10 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
